data.title: One Way Towards A Main Nebula + Gravity Well Hold
data.description: Use this standard and simple setup towards A Main to make it difficult for Attackers to easily take control.

data.title: Early B Main Gravity Well Combo Utility Play
data.description: At the start of the round, coordinate with your teammate to send damaging utility on your ping towards B Main with your Gravity Well.

data.title: Full A Site Nebula Hold + Stun For Switch
data.description: Follow this setup to lock down the A Site, allowing you to allocate more resources and teammates towards the other parts of the map.

data.title: Early Round Support in Mid for Duelists with Nebula
data.description: Use one of these Nebula variations to support your team's efforts to hold deeper sightlines into Mid and look for picks on Attackers peeking into Mid.

data.title: B Site Chokepoint Hold Using Only Gravity Well
data.description: Use all of your standard pieces of utility to hold down the B Main chokepoint, or at least break up the Attackers push into B Site.
